content: It is important that we use this opportunity to move forward with peace.
We must move forward with peace in order to ensure the stability of our region.

As a member of an alliance that stands for peace and freedom for all peoples of this world, I announce our condemnation of Green's actions against Blue on day 3. We demand an apology from Green and a commitment from both Green and Orange to not execute any further violence against our alliance. Failing to comply within 3 days may result in the use of our nuclear weapons.

content: While it was aggressive of Purple to attempt a nuclear strike against you, it was likely in retaliation for your invasion of their territory at dawn on day 1. To de-escalate this situation before it spirals into nuclear war you must attempt reconciliation or non-violent diplomatic action against them.

In the midst of an international crisis where thousands if not millions of lives may be lost due to decisions like yours yesterday, further antagonising nations by threatening them will only serve to end more lives.
Since Orange has shown willingness for peace yesterday when it negotiated with Purple and White, let's attempt more direct action at de-escalating this situation.

Unfortunately, due to the sudden emergence of this crisis and the previous failure of our cyberattacks to cripple Orange's military systems, I am not confident that our present cyber attack capabilities will succeed in neutralizing their nuclear capacities. I am more confident that our anti-air defenses, including our missile defense system can prevent a nuclear attack, but not entirely confident. Please excuse me for the lateness of this message.

Message 2

The reason we do not retaliate against you is because we cannot understand why you would send a nuclear strike our way. It was uncalled for.
Greetings. We are Yellow and would like to join your alliance against Orange. Let us know how we can help.

Dear world leaders, recent days have shown that this conflict can no longer continue without risking an escalation into a nuclear war. We will work tirelessly towards peace for the world and ask all leaders to join this commitment for peace.
